title: Get into a routine
description: Getting into a routine lets you get used to studying, and helps make the transition to post-secondary much easier!

title: Use class time wisely
description: To maximize what you learn, you should be taking notes, reading lectures before hand, and creating flash cards!

title: Study everyday
description: To make sure you don't have an information overload, try to study your notes a little bit whenever you're free!

title: Meditate or Exercise
description: Meditating and exercising are a great way to keep your body healthy, and several studies say they help with studying as well!
